header.title: Passwork Manager Project
header.subtitle: Password manager project developed with symmetric AES keys and PBE.

text: Security project developed through undergraduate course focused on developing a password manager that leverages the Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2 (PBKDF2) to provide a full-covered scenarios to encrypt and decrypt data using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) crypto cipher without storing the user’s password into a database or files.

As a proof of concept, the project took advantage of Python code simplicity and its pycrypto library to handle all the cryptography part, as well as the application design part, which uses a library that wrappers HTML web pages structures directly inside PySide‘s QtWebKit library.
